descriptionParagraphs: Conversational bots allow users to interact with your web service through text, interactive cards, and task modules.
Bots can handle a few simple commands or complex, artificial intelligence-powered and natural language processing virtual assistants.
Bots can be standalone or a part of a larger application.

detailItemCategories.name: Scenarios
detailItemCategories.description: What could you use bots for?

items.name: Notify users
items.description: Particularly if you provide an interactive card for users to take additional information.

items.name: Collect feedback
items.description: Feedback scenarios like polls and surveys.

items.name: Interactions
items.description: Interactions that can be resolved in a single request/response cycle, where the results are useful for multiple members of the conversation.

items.name: Social/fun bots
items.description: Get an awesome cat image, randomly pick a winner, etc.

items.name: One-to-one chat
items.description: Enable incredibly diverse workloads. Q&A bots, bots that initiate workflows in other systems, bots that tell jokes, and bots that take notes are just a few examples.

items.name: Book-a-room
items.description: Book-a-room is a Microsoft Teams bot that lets users quickly find and reserve a meeting room for 30 (default), 60, or 90 minutes starting from the current time. The Book-a-room bot scopes to personal or 1:1 conversations.

items.name: Company Communicator
items.description: The Company Communicator app enables corporate teams to create and send messages intended for multiple teams or large number of employees over chat allowing organization to reach employees right where they collaborate. Utilize this template for multiple scenarios such as new initiative announcements, employee onboarding, modern learning and development or organization-wide broadcasts.

items.name: Expert Finder
items.description: Expert Finder is a Microsoft Teams bot that identifies specific organization members based on their skills, interests, and education attributes. Members find experts within an organization that match a keyword search of Azure Active Directory user profiles.
